==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|にゅう|せん}}
Probably from {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=にゅうせん}} compound {{m|ltc|入船|tr=nyip zywen|lit=entering ship}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=o|にゅうせん|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|にゅうせん}}

# the [[arrival]] in [[port]] or [[harbor]] of a [[boat]] or [[ship]]
# a [[boat]] or [[ship]] that is coming into [[port]] or [[harbor]]

=====Antonyms=====
* {{ja-r|出船|しゅっせん}}: the [[departure]] from [[port]] or [[harbor]] of a [[boat]] or [[ship]]; a boat or ship departing port or harbor

====Verb====
{{ja-verb-suru|にゅうせん}}

# {{qualifier|said of a boat or ship}} to [[arrive]] at a [[port]] or [[harbor]]

=====Conjugation=====
{{ja-suru|にゅうせん}}

=====Antonyms=====
* {{ja-r|出船|しゅっせん}}: {{qualifier|said of a boat or ship}} to [[leave]] a [[port]] or [[harbor]]

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|いり|ふね}}
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=いりふね|入り|tr1=iri|t1=entry, entering|pos1=the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of verb {{ja-l|入る}} ''hairu'' “to enter”|船|tr2=fune|t2=boat or ship}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=kun|いりふね|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|いりふね}}

# the [[arrival]] in [[port]] or [[harbor]] of a [[boat]] or [[ship]]
# a [[boat]] or [[ship]] that is coming into [[port]] or [[harbor]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=いりふね|slang|archaic}} the act of [[going]] to [[have fun]] in a [[red-light district]]

=====Antonyms=====
* {{ja-r|出船|でふね}}: the [[departure]] [[boat]] or [[ship]]; a boat or ship departing port or harbor

====Proper noun====
{{ja-pos|proper|いりふね}}

# {{surname|lang=ja|sort=いりふね}}

====Verb====
{{ja-verb-suru|いりふね}}

# {{qualifier|said of a boat or ship}} to [[arrive]] at a [[port]] or [[harbor]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=いりふね|slang|archaic}} to [[go]] to [[have fun]] in a [[red-light district]]

=====Conjugation=====
{{ja-suru|いりふね}}

=====Antonyms=====
* {{ja-r|出船|でふね}}: {{qualifier|said of a boat or ship}} to [[leave]] a [[port]] or [[harbor]]
